response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format:

Enforcing School Policies and Rules for Students

1. Clearly communicate policies and expectations - Review student handbook with class at start of year - Post key rules in classroom and refer to them regularly - Discuss rationale behind policies to foster student buy-in 2. Consistently enforce consequences for infractions - Develop a clear, graduated discipline plan - Follow through on stated consequences every time - Document incidents and disciplinary actions taken 3. Recognize and reinforce positive behaviors - Implement a classroom reward system - Praise students frequently for meeting expectations - Send positive notes home to inform parents of good conduct 4. Partner with administrators and parents - Report major or recurring issues to school administration - Contact parents early when problems arise - Work as a team to support the student
